lenders.occupational_info:
The Bliss Women and Children Project is a Christian  nonprofit Organization whose main focus is to spread the love of Christ and hope to poor women and children , displaced ,widows destitute, abandoned and those who face the challenge of HIV/AIDS epidemic.  We deal primarily with women and children. We offer aid and help  with basics ie food and clothing  among other needful in life is education .For women ,We train them on small scale businesses.and then offer micro finance to enable them start earning, The centre has a few projects already in progress eg baking, weaving.& knitting, The Center was founded under the leadership of Esther   Githaiga  and have granted a good relationship with  the families we work with:-
SUBSCRIBE TO BWCP
